attributes.action: Vaccination as Condition of Deployment for Politicians. (MP, HofL, HofC, etc.)
attributes.additional_details:
To keep them Save like they like to keep save health and  care workers.
They meet with a lot of people and visiting for example Hospital, and other public places.

rejection.details:
